resources.string: a game of revolution is a game of trying to unscramble a grid of scrambled numbers into ascending order. to do this you click on a button signifying the top left button of a 2x2 grid. You can then rotate them using the buttons underneath the grid on the left. The third button from the left is an undo button to restore to any previous move of the game. The button on the right is for starting a new game with your desired difficulty .
There are no moves to undo.
The game is already in the starting state.
